docs.snippet: General Motors said, it was recalling nearly 780,000 crossover SUVs, mainly in North America, because their rear power lift gates could suddenly fall and hit people. Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors said, it was recalling nearly 780,000 crossover SUVs, mainly in North America, because their rear power lift gates could suddenly fall and hit people. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.main: South Carolina Capitol's Confederate Flag Joins Revered Museum Collection
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Capitol's Confederate Flag Joins Revered Museum Collection

docs.snippet: The Confederate battle flag removed from South Carolina's capitol on Friday has joined about 40 other historic banners housed at a museum honoring the state's military legacy, some of them surrendered by rebel forces at the end of the American Civ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Confederate battle flag removed from South Carolina's capitol on Friday has joined about 40 other historic banners housed at a museum honoring the state's military legacy, some of them surrendered by rebel forces at the end of the American Civil War.

headline.main: Reddit Interim CEO Pao Resigns; Huffman Regains CEO Title
headline.print_headline: Reddit Interim CEO Pao Resigns; Huffman Regains CEO Title

docs.snippet: Reddit said Friday that interim CEO Ellen Pao resigned from the company, and co-founder Steve Huffman is back as its CEO....
docs.lead_paragraph: Reddit said Friday that interim CEO Ellen Pao resigned from the company, and co-founder Steve Huffman is back as its CEO.

headline.main: Judges Appear Skeptical of Obama Immigration Actions
headline.print_headline: Judges Appear Skeptical of Obama Immigration Actions

docs.snippet: U.S. appeals court judges on Friday appeared divided as they considered President Barack Obama's effort to shield more than 4 million illegal immigrants from deportation, a policy put on hold by a lower court as a presidential overreach....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. appeals court judges on Friday appeared divided as they considered President Barack Obama's effort to shield more than 4 million illegal immigrants from deportation, a policy put on hold by a lower court as a presidential overreach.

headline.main: Former Candidate Asks Tennessee to Allow Assisted Suicide
headline.print_headline: Former Candidate Asks Tennessee to Allow Assisted Suicide

docs.snippet: A former Democratic gubernatorial candidate who is terminally ill is asking a state court in Tennessee to declare he has a right to end his life when he wants and on his own terms....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Democratic gubernatorial candidate who is terminally ill is asking a state court in Tennessee to declare he has a right to end his life when he wants and on his own terms.

headline.main: Greek PM Tsipras Defends 'Difficult' Choices Over Bailout
headline.print_headline: Greek PM Tsipras Defends 'Difficult' Choices Over Bailout

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras defended the painful bailout proposals his leftwing government presented to parliament on Friday, saying they were difficult measures but would help keep Greece in the euro zone....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras defended the painful bailout proposals his leftwing government presented to parliament on Friday, saying they were difficult measures but would help keep Greece in the euro zone.
